title: How to write an amazing biology grant - Quora

response.answer_text: Have a stunningly original research quesiion that will, if solved, create new knowledge that everyone will recognize as an advance in the fieldShow that you have thoroughly researched the problem and are fully aware of previous researchHave a convincing methodology that shows clearly that the problem will be solved by following it.Show that you have the facilities and the personnel to carry out the research. If you are in a university or other research facility, demonstrating that you have the institutional support and the capacity to carry out the project, including logistical and financial backing.In the end, the important criterion is that you have an important problem to research, and that you will be able to spend the grant money effectively so that the problem will be solved with the money provided. A reseach grant is an investment from a funding source, and you must demonstrate high probability that there will be excellent and convincing results from the research.
